item.title: 印度银行的贷款利润率将随着利率下调触底反弹
item.description: 包括 HDFC Bank Ltd. 和 ICICI Bank Ltd. 在内的印度银行的收益预计将表明，在央行最近的降息周期和旨在恢复经济增长的减税措施之后，利润率已经触底。【原文：Indian banks including HDFC Bank Ltd. and ICICI Bank Ltd. earnings are expected to signal that margins have bottomed out, after the central bank’s recent rate-cutting cycle and tax breaks aimed at reviving economic growth.】

item.title: 日本通过乐天交易获得今年收益率最高的日元债券
item.description: 乐天集团公司以 4.691% 的年内最高票面利率为当地债券定价，使日本信贷市场最清楚地看到了利率上升对企业借贷成本的影响。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. priced a local bond at the year’s highest coupon of 4.691%, giving Japan’s credit market the clearest sign yet of the impact of rising rates on corporate borrowing costs.】

item.title: 据说瑞波实验室将牵头为 XRP 储备筹集 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc. ）正在牵头筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金，用于积累与该公司相关的数字代币 XRP，这表明近期的市场动荡并没有阻止加密货币重量级企业全力推进其商业计划。【原文：Ripple Labs Inc. is leading an effort to raise at least $1 billion to accumulate XRP, the digital token linked to the company, in a sign that the recent market tumult has not stopped cryptocurrency heavyweights from pursuing their business plans full-force.】

item.title: 任天堂的目标是到 3 月份生产 2,500 万台 Switch 2
item.description: 任天堂公司已要求供应商在2026年3月底之前生产多达2500万台Switch 2，这将使该公司的游戏机首年销量达到创纪录的水平，而这款游戏机已经达到了全球游戏业的最高水位。【原文：Nintendo Co. has asked suppliers to produce as many as 25 million units of the Switch 2 by the end of March 2026, setting the company up for record first-year sales of a console that’s already reached high-water marks for the global gaming sector.】

item.title: 通过 Lenskart IPO，"鲨鱼坦克 "评委佩尤什-班萨尔接近亿万富翁地位
item.description: 15 年多前，佩尤什-班萨尔（Peyush Bansal）与他在 LinkedIn 上结识的合作伙伴一起创办了眼镜制造商 Lenskart Solutions Ltd.，并将其发展成为价值数十亿美元的企业。现在，这位 41 岁的企业家和印度电视明星正准备大赚一笔。【原文：Peyush Bansal founded eyewear-maker Lenskart Solutions Ltd. more than 15 years ago with partners he met on LinkedIn and grew it into a multi-billion dollar business. Now the 41-year-old entrepreneur and Indian television star is in line for a windfall.】

item.title: 关注供应和中美紧张局势，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于投资者关注供应和中美贸易紧张局势重燃的后果，石油连续第三周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly decline as investors focused on supply and the fallout of renewed US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 投资者等待未来首相出台政策，高市贸易停滞不前
item.description: 尽管有关新联盟的讨论支持了高市真奈竞选日本首相，但投资者希望看到政策的具体细节，然后再进一步押注高市真奈将继续主张货币和财政刺激政策。【原文：Even as talk of a new coalition bolsters Sanae Takaichi’s bid to become Japan’s prime minister, investors want to see specifics on policy before they pile further into bets that she will keep advocating for monetary and fiscal stimulus.】

item.title: 香港财务总监称约 200 家公司计划首次公开募股
item.description: 香港最高金融官员表示，200 多家公司正在排队等待在香港上市，为这个亚洲中心城市今年的股票销售增添了强劲动力。【原文：More than 200 firms are lining up to go public in Hong Kong, adding to a strong year for stock sales in the Asian hub, the city’s top finance official said.】

item.title: 中国出口繁荣难阻经济创年内最差季度
item.description: 尽管出口蓬勃发展，但中国经济上季度的增长速度可能是一年来最慢的，中国共产党可能会在下周召开的一次重要会议上通过倡导提高消费来纠正这种脱节。【原文：China’s economy likely expanded at the slowest in a year last quarter despite a boom in exports, a disconnect the Communist Party may move to rectify by championing higher consumption when it convenes for a key meeting next week.】

item.title: 瑞银、汇丰积极进军价值 8 万亿美元的台湾财富市场
item.description: 随着台湾政府放宽资金管理规定，以利用蓬勃发展的个人财富，全球银行竞相在台湾快速增长的 8 万亿美元财富市场分一杯羹。【原文：Global banks are racing to secure a piece of Taiwan’s rapidly growing $8 trillion wealth market as the government eases money-management regulations to capitalize on booming personal fortunes.】

item.title: 花旗银行向美联储出售阿根廷比索，作为财政部救援行动的一部分
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团周四向美联储出售了阿根廷比索，这是美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）为提振阿根廷货币和哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）政府所做的广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Citigroup Inc. sold Argentine pesos to the Federal Reserve on Thursday as part of US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s wide-ranging effort to buoy the currency and Javier Milei’s administration, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥地利 VIG 公司将以约 16 亿美元收购竞争对手 Nuernberger 公司
item.description: 奥地利维也纳保险集团同意收购德国竞争对手 Nuernberger Beteiligungs AG，交易价值约为 14 亿欧元（16 亿美元）。【原文：Austria’s Vienna Insurance Group AG agreed to buy German rival Nuernberger Beteiligungs AG in a deal valued at about €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion).】

item.title: 信贷担忧和中美紧张局势引发金银创纪录
item.description: 黄金和白银触及历史高位，原因是对经济信贷质量的担忧和中美摩擦加剧增强了避险需求，同时投资者纷纷押注美联储可能在今年大幅降息。【原文：Gold and silver touched all-time highs as fears about credit quality in the economy and heightened US-China frictions strengthened demand for havens, while investors piled into bets that the Federal Reserve could deploy an outsized rate cut this year.】

item.title: 信贷危机打压情绪，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于两家美国银行的不良贷款加剧了人们对信贷市场的担忧，华尔街的风险情绪有所减弱，周五亚洲股市将低开。【原文：Asian stocks are set to open lower Friday after risk sentiment dimmed on Wall Street as bad loans at two US banks heightened concerns about the credit market.】

item.title: OZK 银行出售芝加哥 60 亿美元开发项目失败的地块
item.description: 芝加哥一个耗资 60 亿美元的房地产开发项目失败，其部分土地终于找到了买家。【原文：Part of the land under a failed $6 billion real estate development in Chicago finally found a buyer.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调塞内加尔债务估值，新项目谈判拉开帷幕
item.description: 国际货币基金组织对塞内加尔债务的计算结果高于此前的估计，这加剧了人们对其财政前景的担忧，而此时，与贷款方就新计划的正式谈判正在进行。【原文：The International Monetary Fund calculated Senegal’s debt at above previous estimates, stoking concerns about its fiscal outlook just as formal talks with the lender on a new program get underway.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将在特朗普重要会谈前宣传稀土优势
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）将在与美国国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）的会谈中，宣传澳大利亚有能力成为华盛顿努力实现稀土供应链多样化的重要组成部分，而不是中国。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers will promote his nation’s ability to be a crucial part of Washington’s efforts to diversify the rare earths supply chain away from China, as part of talks with Kevin Hassett, the director of the National Economic Council.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰完成最大一笔私人资本交易，促进 Meta 的人工智能发展
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）的 Meta Platforms 公司将为其位于路易斯安那州农村地区的数据中心基地完成近 300 亿美元的一揽子融资，这标志着有史以来最大的私人资本交易迈出了最后一步。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta Platforms Inc. is set to seal an almost $30 billion financing package for its data center site in rural Louisiana, marking the final step for the largest private capital deal on record.】

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员称美国关税对价格的影响尚不明确
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员 Edward Scicluna 说，欧洲央行不能匆忙采取进一步的利率行动，这也是因为美国提高贸易征税对物价的影响尚不明确。【原文：The European Central Bank mustn’t rush further interest-rate action, also because the effects of higher US trade levies on prices aren’t yet clear, Governing Council member Edward Scicluna said.】

item.title: CME 计划推出体育合约与 Kalshi 竞争
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：CME Group Inc. is planning to debut financial contracts tied to both sports games and economic indicators by the end of the year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员 "先卖后问 "导致地区性银行暴跌
item.description: 地区性银行股的暴跌凸显了一种观点，而这种观点正在惶恐不安的交易者中占据主导地位：现在卖出，以后再问。【原文：A brutal rout in regional bank stocks is highlighting a view that is taking hold among jittery traders: Sell now, ask questions later.】

item.title: 投资者为何对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 生活成本飙升，东京购房者对购房计划意见不一
item.description: 日本的通货膨胀对东京房地产市场的影响是双向的。【原文：Japan’s bout of inflation is cutting both ways in the Tokyo housing market.】

item.title: 三井物产首席财务官认为发动机和美国起重机需求带来的利润势头超过全年预期
item.description: 日本船舶设备制造商三井物产株式会社（Mitsui E&S Co.）预计，在发动机需求强劲和起重机业务成功转向美国的推动下，利润增长势头将超过全年预期。【原文：Japanese ship-equipment maker Mitsui E&S Co. expects profit momentum to surpass its full-year guidance, fueled by robust demand for engines and a successful pivot of the crane business toward the US.】

item.title: 高盛的沃尔德伦警告信贷 "爆炸 "的后果
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）说，过去十年来，信贷出现了爆炸式增长，如果情况恶化，后果将不堪设想。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. President John Waldron said there’s been an explosion in the growth of credit over the past decade — and that the fallout if things go south won’t be pretty.】

item.title: 鲍威尔关注量化宽松政策，银行储备重回 3 万亿美元以下
item.description: 就在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出量化紧缩政策可能在未来几个月内停止的信号时，美联储决定继续缩减资产负债表的一个关键因素--美国银行系统的储备金再次降至 3 万亿美元以下。【原文：The US banking system’s reserves, a key factor in the Federal Reserve’s decision to keep shrinking its balance sheet, sank below $3 trillion once again, just as Chair Jerome Powell signaled quantitative tightening could stop in the coming months.】

item.title: 为什么 OpenAI 正在推动设计自己的人工智能芯片？
item.description: OpenAI 最新的数十亿美元芯片交易标志着该公司的新方向。但首先...【原文：OpenAI’s latest multibillion-dollar chips deal marks a new direction for the company. But first…】

item.title: 日本央行决定临近，上田对加息保持开放态度
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，如果实现经济前景的信心增强，日本央行将继续收紧政策；这为近期加息敞开了大门。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda indicated that the bank will continue tightening if confidence in achieving its economic outlook strengthens — keeping the door open for a near-term interest-rate hike.】

item.title: 贝尼奥夫呼吁向旧金山派兵遭长期风险投资盟友抨击
item.description: 风险投资家罗恩-康威（Ron Conway）在抨击首席执行官马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）呼吁唐纳德-特朗普总统向旧金山派遣国民警卫队后，将离开 Salesforce 公司慈善基金会董事会。【原文：Venture capitalist Ron Conway is leaving the board of Salesforce Inc.’s philanthropic foundation after blasting Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff for calling on President Donald Trump to send the National Guard to San Francisco.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老金在反弹前减持美国科技股
item.description: 在被称为 "七巨头 "的美国超大市值科技股飙升至新高之前，澳大利亚顶级养老基金纷纷减持这些股票，这凸显了与人工智能推动的牛市保持同步所面临的挑战。【原文：Australia’s top pension funds cut holdings in the US mega-cap tech stocks known as the Magnificent Seven before the group raced to new highs, underscoring the challenge of keeping pace with the AI-fueled bull market.】
